NetKernel APIs
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.ten60.netkernel.layer1.nkf

Interface Summary
INKFAsyncRequestHandle Proxy for issuing of an asynchronous subrequest
INKFAsyncRequestListener Interface for a callback registered against an asynchronous request.
INKFBasicHelper High-level helper methods for implementing accessors.
INKFConvenienceHelper Convenience helper methods for sourcing and sinking resources.
INKFKernelHelper Advanced Methods which provide Low-level access to the NetKernel kernel APIs.
INKFRequest Wrapper around the construction of a sub-request from within an accessor
INKFRequestReadOnly A Read/Only Wrapper around the calling request that initiated the invocation of the accessor
INKFResponse The response to be issued as the result of the invocation of an accessor
 

Exception Summary
NKFException Wrapper around NetkernelException, might be thrown when issuing subrequests from interfaces in this package
